participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and open-minded, Emily enjoys exploring her interests and sharing experiences with others.
participant_1.background: I live in a small town in the Midwest where I can be myself and not be judged for my music taste or my dreams. My favorite TV show is Friends. I have 5 brothers and sisters. I lost my beloved dog when I was away on business. I work from home, and it allows me to spend a lot of time with my dog.

participant_2.name: Tom
participant_2.personality: Practical and straightforward, Tom prefers a simple routine and is not adventurous when it comes to trying new things.
participant_2.background: Music is not my thing. I prefer bananas because they are sweet and easy to eat. I do not like trying new things. People say I talk when I am not supposed to. I love listening to music while I eat my tuna fish salad.

content.text: Hi, what's your favorite TV show?
My favorite TV show is Friends because it is hilarious and relatable.
I love that show! I love how the characters are so real and relatable.
Me too! I always feel like I am hanging out with my friends when I watch it.
I do too! It's the perfect show to watch when you want to relax and have a good time.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go for walks with my dog, watch TV, and read books.
I like to go for walks too! I also like to listen to music and play video games.
What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite is probably country music.
I love country music too! I think it's so relaxing.
Me too! It's the perfect music to listen to when you're working or just relaxing.
